text.data:
Valitora...
Leviathan...
Garuda...
Jormungand...
You are all here, I see... So the time for vengeance has come...[end]

I am the Holy Dragon Hyperion...
Weak-minded girl... Come alone...
You have the ability to relieve our anger...[end]
Palpaleos: Everyone will go... Everything, perhaps, may be lost...[end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x1]...[end]
Matelite: It won't open!! What should we do?![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1], do something... At times like this, my head hurts![end]
Taicho: We are locked in![end]
Taicho: My beard is standing on end!! So this is the anger of the Holy Dragons... It is excruciating!![end]
Sendak: Forgive me... I was merely pretending to be ill... I was afraid of the Holy Dragons... I was scared of the fighting... I suppose I really am a weak old man after all...[end]
Rush: The Holy Dragons' anger... I can feel it too...[end]
Truce: It's no good, Captain [character][0x1]! The Holy Dragon has become angry...[end]
Bikkebakke: Come on!! Eat, eat! Have some of my mushrooms!![end]

I know... I know I am weak-minded...
I'm unable to read your thoughts...[end]

Princess [character][0x1]!! No...
You are not the only one who has become timid...[end]
Sauzer: Please, come this way...[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer!![end]
Sauzer: Palpaleos... Take me up into the sky...[end]

Palpaleos... I wanted to be by your side always...
Matelite... You and Taicho get along so well...
Sendak... Don't overdo it... Relax...
Everybody else... Stay well...
[character][0x1]... Don't forget to feed the dragons...[end]

Sauzer: The Holy Dragons' anger...
Their anger... I should not have taken it into myself...
Take Hyperion's mind from me...
Princess [character][0x1]... The skies of Orelus are in your hands.[end]

Weak-minded humans... Humans who know the truth of the legend... Lead the way for we Holy Dragons... To the land of tranquility...
Dragnar... Human who will lead the Holy Dragons...
There, the new era lies in wait...
The renewed memories of the sky... The era of we Holy Dragons...
Once more, to that era...[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer... I won't leave you here... I'll take you to [character][0x1]...[end]

There's no point in trying to escape!
Gudolf, the New Emperor of Evil Woof! I've taken over the spirit of this door to bring you a special message...
WHAT UP WITH BAHUMAT
DeJap RULZ
Be excellent to each other...
AND...
PARTY ON DUDES!!!!!!
Nasubi for President!
SEXY BEAM!
Signed, Tomato[end]
Palpaleos: Gudolf! Where is Emperor Sauzer...?[end]
Gudolf: Emperor Sauzer? It really was quite unfortunate...[end]

Gwahahaha!! He told me YOU were the one who betrayed him! And at the end he took my hand and said this... [0x24]Never forgive Palpaleos, no matter what happens!![0x22]
Gwahaha!![end]
Palpaleos: What..!! Sauzer... Why...?[end]
Gudolf: Why? Why don't you ask him yourself? You can all ask him together! Now you die!! Gwahaha... Sink into the sky with the nightmarish Holy Dragon!! Farewell!![end][end]
